query: wyzmindz solutions pvt ltd bengaluru karnataka

places.name: Wyzmindz Solutions
places.address: Wyzmindz Solutions, Survey # 19/3, 3rd Floor, Srinivasa Industrial Estate, Kanakapura Rd, behind RMS International School & PU college, Konanakunte, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560062

featured_question.question: How to apply for the job
featured_question.answer: Go to linked in only there you can see about vacancies

detailed_address.street: Survey # 19/3, 3rd Floor, Srinivasa Industrial Estate, Kanakapura Rd, behind RMS International School & PU college

featured_reviews.review_id:
The day I've joined this organization, I wasn't quite sure what it's gonna bring up to me and I came with the same mindset that I had in my last organization which was to be in your lane and complete every day's monotonous, expected work. I never really felt the need to push myself out of the 'comfort zone' and to learn something new.
For me, it's been such a inspiring experience since the time I've joined and every day's uncertainty is eventually teaching me something new in all aspects of my life.
Seeing women of the organization handling and doing their work so graciously and confidently has been fascinating, looking forward it always.
And the irony is whenever I second guess my calibre before doing something which  either I haven't been accustomed to or haven't done before, our supervisors are always there to motivate us and sort out things for us.
And as Sachin Sir said-'Agree to disagree'
This particular statement has been immensely helpful for me in reducing my overthinking, move forward and be mindful generally and professionally.
So far it's been a 'Wyz' decision to join 'Wyzmindz'.

featured_reviews.review_id: "I thoroughly enjoyed my time working at Wyzmindz. The company provided a stimulating and collaborative environment that allowed me to grow both professionally and personally. It was a rewarding experience, and I appreciated the opportunities and challenges that came with it."
featured_reviews.review_text: "I thoroughly enjoyed my time working at Wyzmindz. The company provided a stimulating and collaborative environment that allowed me to grow both professionally and personally. It was a rewarding experience, and I appreciated the opportunities and challenges that came with it."

featured_reviews.review_id: WyzMindz is more than just a workplace; it's a second home, where the commitment to employee well-being, continuous growth, and a strong sense of belonging make it a truly exceptional place to work.
featured_reviews.review_text: WyzMindz is more than just a workplace; it's a second home, where the commitment to employee well-being, continuous growth, and a strong sense of belonging make it a truly exceptional place to work.

featured_reviews.review_id:
I have been with Wyzmindz since last one year and here's my honest reviews on it...

Pros :-
(1) Great place to work; especially for freshers where most of the companies don't prefer freshers, Wyzmindz invests in them, nurtures them with their expertise.
(2) Great place to learn; they promote for online courses of your choice even if it's paid. One can surely grow along with his/her work.
(3) Supportive and very approachable management.
(4) Promote and support work-life-balance.
(5) Value each personnel irrespective of the role.
(6) Tech. focused leaders who inspire and motivate you always throughout your journey.
(7) If you are honest with your job then certainly you will get benefited with big rewards. There are big Tech. Giants that you can work along with and have an experience of your life time that you can never buy with any physical wealth.

Cons :-
(1) Salary is very low as per the market.

featured_reviews.review_id: The best thing I experienced here is light mantra which done every morning in our office is a best way to start the day.
featured_reviews.review_text: The best thing I experienced here is light mantra which done every morning in our office is a best way to start the day.

featured_reviews.review_id: An excellent, friendly, and supportive environment is provided where everyone is willing to assist with your work. You never feel isolated while working here. A lot can be learned under the guidance of the leadership panel. All employees have access to an internal learning app that provides opportunities for learning and facilitates transition.

featured_reviews.review_id: Excellent place to work with. Learning new skills and growing along with the organization is the best part. Friendly management. As a married women every one want to work from home at their comfortability , wyzminds gave that opportunity to me. Its a great privilege to work here. Thank you wyzminds management team.

featured_reviews.review_id: Positive work environment. The most beautiful part is that you are free to learn any skill as per your interest, and you will get all the support from team members, which creates a culture of growth and development where employees feel valued and empowered to reach their full potential.
